X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The total number of requests in a given time window.

id.description: The unique identifier of the client
The hashed if of the contact

user_id.description: The hashed id of the user who created the contact

client_id.description: The hashed id of the client

first_name.description: The first name of the contact

last_name.description: The last name of the contact

phone.description: The phone number of the contact

accepted_terms_version.description: The terms of service which the contact has accpeted

password.description: The hashed password of the contact

confirmation_code.description: The confirmation code used to authenticate the contacts email address

contact_key.description: A unique identifier for the contact

is_primary.description: Defines is this contact is the primary contact for the client

confirmed.description: Boolean value confirms the user has confirmed their account.

is_locked.description: Boolean value defines if the contact has been locked out.

send_email.description: Boolean value determines is this contact should receive emails

failed_logins.description: The number of failed logins the contact has had

email_verified_at.description: The date which the contact confirmed their email

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the client

assigned_user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who has been assigned the client

name.description: The name of the client company or organization

website.description: The website URL of the client company or organization

private_notes.description: Notes that are only visible to the user who created the client
private_notes.example: Client prefers email communication over phone calls

client_hash.description: A unique hash value for the client

industry_id.description: The unique identifier of the industry the client operates in

size_id.description: The unique identifier for the size category of the client company or organization

address1.description: First line of the client's address

address2.description: Second line of the client's address, if needed

city.description: The city the client is located in

state.description: The state, province, or locality the client is located in

postal_code.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the client

country_id.description: The unique identifier of the client's country

oneOf.title: Country Types

country_id.title: CountryType

custom_value1.description: A custom field for storing additional information

custom_value2.description: A custom field for storing additional information

custom_value3.description: A custom field for storing additional information

custom_value4.description: A custom field for storing additional information

vat_number.description: The client's VAT (Value Added Tax) number, if applicable

id_number.description: A unique identification number for the client, such as a tax ID or business registration number

number.description: A system-assigned unique number for the client, typically used for invoicing purposes

shipping_address1.description: First line of the client's shipping address

shipping_address2.description: Second line of the client's shipping address, if needed

shipping_city.description: The city of the client's shipping address

shipping_state.description: The state, province, or locality of the client's shipping address

shipping_postal_code.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the client's shipping address

shipping_country_id.description: The unique identifier of the country for the client's shipping address

is_deleted.description: A boolean value indicating whether the client has been deleted or not

balance.description: The outstanding balance the client owes

paid_to_date.description: The total amount the client has paid to date

credit_balance.description: The available credit balance for the client to use on future purchases

last_login.description: The timestamp of the client's last login

created_at.description: The timestamp when the client was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the client was last updated

group_settings_id.description: The group settings assigned to the client

routing_id.description: The routing address id for e-invoicing for this client

is_tax_exempt.description: Flag which defines if the client is exempt from taxes

has_valid_vat_number.description: Flag which defines if the client has a valid VAT number

payment_balance.description: Defines the payment balance the client has on file (pre payments / over payments / unapplied amounts)

show_currency_code.description: Toggles whether the currency symbol or code is shown

payment_terms.description: -1 sets no payment term, 0 sets payment due immediately, positive integers indicates payment terms in days

company_gateway_ids.description: A commad separate list of available gateways

enable_client_portal_tasks.description: Show/hide the tasks panel in the client portal

bcc_email.description: A comma separate list of BCC emails

pdf_email_attachment.description: Toggles whether to attach PDF as attachment

ubl_email_attachment.description: Toggles whether to attach UBL as attachment

counter_number_applied.description: enum when the invoice number counter is set, ie when_saved, when_sent, when_paid

quote_number_applied.description: enum when the quote number counter is set, ie when_saved, when_sent

custom_message_dashboard.description: A custom message which is displayed on the dashboard

custom_message_unpaid_invoice.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a unpaid invoice.

custom_message_paid_invoice.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a paid invoice.

custom_message_unapproved_quote.description: A custom message which is displayed in the client portal when a client is viewing a unapproved quote.

lock_invoices.description: Toggles whether invoices are locked once sent and cannot be modified further

auto_archive_invoice.description: Toggles whether a invoice is archived immediately following payment

auto_archive_quote.description: Toggles whether a quote is archived after being converted to a invoice

auto_convert_quote.description: Toggles whether a quote is converted to a invoice when approved

inclusive_taxes.description: Boolean flag determining whether inclusive or exclusive taxes are used

task_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the task number pattern

reminder_send_time.description: Time from UTC +0 when the email will be sent to the client

expense_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the expense number pattern

vendor_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the vendor number pattern

ticket_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the ticket number pattern

payment_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the payment number pattern

invoice_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the invoice number pattern

quote_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the quote number pattern

client_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the client number pattern

credit_number_pattern.description: Allows customisation of the credit number pattern

recurring_invoice_number_prefix.description: This string is prepended to the recurring invoice number

reset_counter_frequency_id.description: CONSTANT which is used to apply the frequency which the counters are reset

reset_counter_date.description: The explicit date which is used to reset counters

counter_padding.description: Pads the counter with leading zeros

shared_invoice_quote_counter.description: Flags whether to share the counter for invoices and quotes

update_products.description: Determines if client fields are updated from third party APIs

fill_products.description: Automatically fill products based on product_key

invoice_taxes.description: Taxes can be applied to the invoice

invoice_design_id.description: The default design id (invoice, quote etc)

quote_design_id.description: The default design id (invoice, quote etc)

email_sending_method.description: The email driver to use to send email, options include default, gmail

gmail_sending_user_id.description: The hashed_id of the user account to send email from

email_template_invoice.description: The full template for invoice emails

email_template_quote.description: The full template for quote emails

email_template_payment.description: The full template for payment emails

email_template_reminder_endless.description: The full template for enless reminders

enable_portal_password.description: Toggles whether a password is required to log into the client portal

show_accept_invoice_terms.description: Toggles whether the terms dialogue is shown to the client

show_accept_quote_terms.description: Toggles whether the terms dialogue is shown to the client

require_invoice_signature.description: Toggles whether a invoice signature is required

require_quote_signature.description: Toggles whether a quote signature is required

hide_paid_to_date.description: Flags whether to hide the paid to date field

embed_documents.description: Toggled whether to embed documents in the PDF

document_email_attachment.description: Toggles whether to attach documents in the email

enable_client_portal_password.description: Toggles password protection of the client portal

enable_email_markup.description: Toggles the use of markdown in emails

enable_client_portal_dashboard.description: Toggles whether the client dashboard is shown in the client portal

enable_client_portal.description: Toggles whether the entire client portal is displayed to the client, or only the context

email_template_statement.description: The body of the email for statements

email_subject_statement.description: The subject of the email for statements

signature_on_pdf.description: Toggles whether the signature (if available) is displayed on the PDF

enable_reminder1.description: Toggles whether this reminder is enabled

enable_reminder2.description: Toggles whether this reminder is enabled

enable_reminder3.description: Toggles whether this reminder is enabled

late_fee_amount1.description: The late fee amount for reminder 1

late_fee_amount2.description: The late fee amount for reminder 2

late_fee_amount3.description: The late fee amount for reminder 2

endless_reminder_frequency_id.description: The frequency id of the endless reminder

client_online_payment_notification.description: Determines if a client should receive the notification for a online payment

client_manual_payment_notification.description: Determines if a client should receive the notification for a manually entered payment

default_expense_payment_type_id.description: The default payment type for expenses

mailgun_endpoint.description: The mailgun endpoint - used to determine whether US or EU endpoints are used

client_initiated_payments.description: Determines if clients can initiate payments directly from the client portal

client_initiated_payments_minimum.description: The minimum amount a client can pay

sync_invoice_quote_columns.description: Determines if invoice and quote columns are synced for the PDF rendering, or if they use their own columns

show_task_item_description.description: Determines if the task item description is shown on the invoice

allow_billable_task_items.description: Determines if task items can be marked as billable

accept_client_input_quote_approval.description: Determines if clients can approve quotes and also pass through a PO Number reference

custom_sending_email.description: When using Mailgun or Postmark, the FROM email address can be customized using this setting.

show_paid_stamp.description: Determines if the PAID stamp is shown on the invoice

show_shipping_address.description: Determines if the shipping address is shown on the invoice

company_logo_size.description: The size of the company logo on the PDF - percentage value between 0 and 100

show_email_footer.description: Determines if the email footer is shown on emails

email_alignment.description: The alignment of the email body text, options include left / center / right

auto_bill_standard_invoices.description: Determines if standard invoices are automatically billed when they are created or due

send_email_on_mark_paid.description: Determines if an email is sent when an invoice is marked as paid

vendor_portal_enable_uploads.description: Determines if vendors can upload files to the portal

qr_iban.description: The IBAN for the QR code

email_subject_purchase_order.description: The email subject for purchase orders

email_template_purchase_order.description: The email template for purchase orders
email_template_purchase_order.example: Please see attached your purchase order.

require_purchase_order_signature.description: Determines if a signature is required on purchase orders

purchase_order_public_notes.description: The public notes for purchase orders
purchase_order_public_notes.example: Please see attached your purchase order.

purchase_order_terms.example: Please see attached your purchase order.

purchase_order_footer.example: Please see attached your purchase order.

purchase_order_design_id.description: The design id for purchase orders

purchase_order_number_pattern.description: The pattern for purchase order numbers

purchase_order_number_counter.description: The counter for purchase order numbers

page_numbering_alignment.description: The alignment for page numbering: options include left / center / right

page_numbering.description: Determines if page numbering is enabled on Document PDFs

auto_archive_invoice_cancelled.description: Determines if invoices are automatically archived when they are cancelled

email_from_name.description: The FROM name for emails when using Custom emailers

show_all_tasks_client_portal.description: Determines if all tasks are shown on the client portal

entity_send_time.description: The time that emails are sent. The time is localized to the clients locale, integer values from 1 - 24

shared_invoice_credit_counter.description: Determines if the invoice and credit counter are shared

reply_to_name.description: The reply to name for emails

hide_empty_columns_on_pdf.description: Determines if empty columns are hidden on PDFs

enable_reminder_endless.description: Determines if endless reminders are enabled

use_credits_payment.description: Determines if credits can be used as a payment method

recurring_invoice_number_pattern.description: The pattern for recurring invoice numbers

recurring_invoice_number_counter.description: The counter for recurring invoice numbers

auto_bill_date.description: Determines when the invoices are auto billed, options are on_send_date (when the invoice is sent) or on_due_date (when the invoice is due))

primary_color.description: The primary color for the client portal / document highlights

secondary_color.description: The secondary color for the client portal / document highlights

client_portal_allow_under_payment.description: Determines if clients can pay invoices under the invoice amount due

client_portal_allow_over_payment.description: Determines if clients can pay invoices over the invoice amount

auto_bill.description: Determines how autobilling is applied for recurring invoices. off (no auto billed), always (always auto bill), optin (The user must opt in to auto billing), optout (The user must opt out of auto billing

client_portal_terms.description: The terms which are displayed on the client portal

client_portal_privacy_policy.description: The privacy policy which is displayed on the client portal
client_portal_privacy_policy.example: These are the terms of use for using the client portal.

client_can_register.description: Determines if clients can register on the client portal

portal_design_id.description: The design id for the client portal

late_fee_endless_percent.description: The late fee percentage for endless late fees

late_fee_endless_amount.description: The late fee amount for endless late fees

auto_email_invoice.description: Determines if invoices are automatically emailed when they are created

classification.description: Classification or category label for organizational purposes

public_notes.description: Notes that are visible to the client
public_notes.example: These are public notes visible to clients

message.description: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
message.example: These credentials do not match our records / Invalid Token
